amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to destroy anti-personnel landmine munitions unless the Secretary of Defense submits a report on research into operational alternatives to these munitions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569 to prohibit funds from being used to destroy anti-personnel landmine munitions unless the Secretary of Defense submits a report on research into operational alternatives to these munitions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
